content.prompt: Construct a program that obtains minutes and remaining seconds from the input amount of time in seconds. For example, 500 seconds contains 8 minutes and 20 seconds.

uses.context_name: Java: CS 007 | CS007 - Java Programming (Fall 2025) > Arithmetic Operations
